title: DDFP 591: Preseason injury risk & Worst QB Belichick could coach to a SB
itunes:title: DDFP 591: Preseason injury risk & Worst QB Belichick could coach to a SB
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Maurice Jones-Drew, Cynthia Frelund and Washington Redskins safety Will Blackmon to discuss the risks associated with the NFL Preseason in response to Odell Beckham Jr.'s injury against the Browns. Also, the fellas and Cynthia determine the worst current QB with whom Bill Belichick could still win a Super Bowl. Then, the guys recap the latest episode of Game of Thrones and participate in another edition of "Surprise Game Show."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
